column3: @hebasto Can you have a look at #14123, as it might fix the issue you're seeing.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #14594 (qt: Fix bug #14591 by hebasto)
* #14123 (gui: Add GUIUtil::bringToFront by promag)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Tested ACK f03c5c30254349314789c0c756d6ba11914d004c\n\nThis successfully solves the "two step" show with the tray icon. Tested on all Ubuntu/macOS/Win.

Not sure this is worth back-porting... All UI-glitch-fixes have the risk to act differently in back ported versions. I would recommend to _not_ back port it (if its not a clear bug that has been fixed).
@Sjors Do you mind reviewing this PR?
I can't find the "Minimize to the tray instead of the taskbar" option on macOS 10.14 with QT 5.11.2.
Ok, this seems to have no effect on macOS, so works for me.\n\n@promag does this get in the way of what you're trying to achieve in #14123? That PR fixes #13829, this PR doesn't.

Closing in favour of #14123, as that has more recent review, and according to this [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14594#issuecomment-433751203) they should be fixing the same issue.
